content:
I agree to a price of 900 Euros per month.

I would like to remind you that the rent is for a 25 square meter apartment and should be based on the current market rate in the area. I would also like to remind you that the rent should be paid monthly in advance.

I would like to propose that we have a lease agreement that is valid for at least one year. This would provide both parties with a sense of security and stability in the rental arrangement.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the proposed lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me on the rental price. I understand your concerns about the market rate in the area and I am willing to agree to a monthly rental price of 900 Euros. I will also make sure to pay the rent in advance monthly.

Regarding the lease agreement, I am open to discussing the terms and conditions. I believe a one-year lease agreement would be beneficial for both parties, as it would provide stability and security in the rental arrangement. If you have any specific requirements or concerns about the lease agreement, please let me know and I will do my best to accommodate them.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi
